syshud_menu_empty_lobby_description: Create a contractless multiplayer lobby. (defaults to friends-only)
syshud_options_empty_lobby_description: Adds a button to the main menu to create a contractless multiplayer lobby. (defaults to friends-only)
syshud_options_steam_inventory_lobby_des: Adds the steam items button in the game lobbys.
syshud_options_skip_black_screen_descrip: Skips the black screen when loading into a heist.
syshud_options_skip_stat_screen_descript: Skips the stat screen at the end of a heist.
syshud_options_skip_stat_screen_timer_de: Skips the stat screen after a set amount of time.
syshud_options_skip_card_screen_descript: Skips the card screen at the end of a heist.
syshud_options_skip_card_screen_timer_de: Skips the card screen after a set amount of time.
